segments.text: It's quite a clever operation those two children have going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is a true strategist, climbing up to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even holding a plate, either to catch them or as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister, the lookout, is ready to receive her sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've chosen their moment perfectly, with the adult preoccupied.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire their teamwork and their audacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, enacted right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The risk of the stool tipping doesn't seem to bother them at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're focused solely on the prize: those delicious cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost sweet, this shared act of forbidden pleasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies before they're caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little moment of rebellion is surprisingly charming.
segments.speaker: PAR
